segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere from that overflowing sink—filthy mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot in the puddle, and she just keeps drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her towel is probably damp now, gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets dripping, floor slick— who leaves it like this?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then the kids, grubby hands in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, about to topple into the slop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl begging for a cookie amid the chaos—yuck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies contaminated by whatever's on their fingers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks clean, but inside it's repulsive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes near the water— they'll get ruined and moldy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the negligence; it's all so unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off the faucet before it floods the whole place!
segments.speaker: PAR
